Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/The Oblitercons:



Nemesis Enforcer inspected the scanners.  Multiple Maximal signatures outside 
of the Ark.  He rubbed his chin.  Rather interesting.  He activated his wrist 
comm. unit.  "Dark One," he spoke into the device, "This is Nemesis Enforcer. 
 Take the Oblitercons and spy on the Maximals at the Ark.  And that's all I 
want you to do.  SPY.  Though, if they open fire on you, OBLITERATE them."

<Ha, ha, ha!> Dark One's voice came over the comm.  <Very funny.  My team and 
I will move out in 8 cycles>

"Excellent." Nemesis Enforcer said, deactivating his comm., sitting back in 
his chair.  Being leader of the Alliance wasn't that hard.  Maybe he'd put a 
gun to Zardus' head and blow it off when he came back and take over.  Yes.  
That was an interesting proposition...
